text: Hey guys, it’s Ro!
Welcome to another Nerdy Nummies.

I got so many requests to make something Sims
related and I thought

hey this is perfect because, Sims 4 comes
out and I have been playing

a lot of Sims. My little Sim is a chef, big
surprise, I know!

And she loves making Key Lime Pie, so I thought,
today I’m gonna show
you how to make Key Lime Pie, from The Sims!
Let’s get started!

The things you will need will be: 2 big mixing
bowls, a mixer, I’m just

gonna be using a hand mixer today. You’re
also gonna be needing graham

crackers, you’re gonna need 2 cups of graham
cracker crumbs, I just ground

them up in the blender, easy-peasy! 2/3 cup
of light brown sugar, 1 sh-tick

of butter which is also 1/2 a cup of butter,
but we’re gonna melt this
before we make our crust. Oh jeez!

4 egg yolks, 1/2 a cup of fresh lime juice,
14 ounces of sweetened

condensed milk, 8 ounces of cream cheese,
I’m using reduced fat cream cheese

because I like it, tastes really
good. And you’ll also need a

drop of green food coloring dye, usual Key
Lime Pies are the color of

cheesecake, but because we want it to look
like the video game, it looks a little

bit more green, so I’m just gonna add 1
drop of this. And then to decorate,

we’re gonna be using fresh limes to decorate
and a little bit of whipped cream!

Alright, oh, and a pie tray… Gonna need
one of those!
Let’s put it all together.

The first thing that you’re gonna do to
make this Key Lime Pie is

we’re gonna make the crust. So you’re
gonna take your graham cracker crumbs,

put them in the big mixing
bowl, add your brown sugar and

add your butter and as you can see, I have
melted it, it’s very hot,

be careful! Then you’re gonna take your
mixer and mix it together until
everything is evenly combined.
Oh, uh-oh! Oh nuts!
Er-bah-dee-ba-dop, bur-doo-bah-dee-bah-doo-ber-dop!

Just kidding! The next thing that you’re
gonna do is just take a handful

of your pie crust mixture, put it in the pan,
and pack it down. And you’re

gonna build all sides. Once you’ve got your
crust in the pan, we’re

gonna bake it to let the crust set. So you’re
just gonna pop it in
the oven at 350 for 8-10 minutes.

While the pie crust is baking in the oven,
we’re gonna make the yummy

Key Lime Pie filling, this is my favorite
part, it’s so good!

Alright, the first thing that you’re gonna
do is take a big mixing bowl,

and we’re gonna add our cream cheese, and
then we’re gonna whip it up.

Whipped! Nice and fluffy, perfect! OK, now
we’re gonna add the condensed milk,

mix again. Now you’re gonna take your 4
eggs, and we just want the egg yolk,

so the yellow part, we don’t what the egg
whites, set those off to the side.

Then we’re gonna mix it up again. Now we’re
gonna add our freshly squeezed

lime juice, smells so good! And, a drop of
green food coloring. And last and
final mix!

Now that we’ve got our Key Lime Pie mixture
ready, and our crust

out of the oven, we’re just gonna pour in
the filling.
Yum, yum, yum!

And now we’re gonna put the pie back in
the oven to bake at 350 for another

8 to 10 minutes. Keep your eye on it, when
you take it out of the oven you’ll

want it to be not completely firm, you’ll
want it when you pick it up it will

jiggle just a little bit. So go ahead and
bake the pie and once its done baking

you’ll let it chill for about 10 minutes
and then we’ll put it in the fridge
for an hour and a half.

Once your pie’s done chilling in the fridge,
it’s my favorite part! It’s time

to decorate! OK, so you’re gonna take a
fresh lime, a cutting board and a knife.

And what we’re gonna do is cut your lime
in half, because in the game the

Key Lime Pie is decorated with 5 slices of
lime.

Now that we’ve got our lime slices all ready,
we’re gonna position them in the

middle of the pie, you’re gonna put 5 of
them. So just like this, fanning

around in a little circle. Leave a
little bit of room right here in the

center. Now you’re gonna take your whipped
cream, oh! Now you’re gonna open

it! Now you’re just gonna put a little dollop
of whipped cream right in the middle.
Woop!

And do an outline of whipped cream, all around
the outside in between
the pie filling and the crust.

Ta-da! Here’s The Sims Key Lime Pie that
we made today!

It looks just like the video game, thanks
you guys for suggesting

something Sims! I have been love playing and
I am so excited for the new

game coming out. And, a big thank you to my
sister, she made my

plumb bob up here. And if you guys are interested
in making one of these for

Halloween or something, I will put a link
down below to the template that we used.

All you need is 1 piece of construction paper.
We used a piece of green
sparkly paper, and some pipe cleaners!

If you have any other ideas for any other
Nerdy Nummies please let me know,

leave me a comment down below and I will do
my baest… My baest? My best
to make it happen!

Also you can follow me on Facebook, Twitter,
Tumblr and Instagram, I

will be posting lots of pictures of this yummy
pie. And, if you guys make

this pie, please send me pictures, I get a
big kick out of seeing your
baking creations.
Alright, thanks again you guys, bye-bye!
Bye-brr-bye-brr!
